thread.title: Ebony G.
thread.title_full: Mainely Urns reviewed by Ebony G.

author: Ebony G.
title: Ebony G.
text: Losing my only child (my daughter) 5/12 months into my pregnancy was beyond devastating. She was a fully developed and gorgeous little girl. I couldn't function, let alone fathom having to bury my only baby. I tried to order her marker dozens of times, but I would always breakdown crying. I finally tried to hold it together long enough to order it, and I succeeded. I selected every word and design. I didn't see an option to add extras, so in the shipping comments, I asked if they could add a butterfly above her name. I refer to and view my baby as my little eternal gorgeous butterfly. To my amazement the proof was beyond perfect and the butterfly was there. I'm beyond Thankful and happy. I couldn't give them a more perfect review. Thank You so much.
